settings.text: Power. Range. Reliability. All backed by local Australian support.

settings.title: Dual 1200W Motors
settings.content: Forget underpowered scooters. The Kaiju’s dual 1200W motors unleash 3600W peak power, giving you explosive acceleration and the torque to glide up steep 30° climbs with ease. Whether you’re tackling city streets or off-road tracks, Kaiju delivers real performance where others stall.

settings.title: Removable Battery
settings.content: Range anxiety? Not with Kaiju. Its removable battery system gives you up to 100km on a single charge, and the freedom to swap in a spare to double your distance. Charge at home, at work, or on the go, the Kaiju adapts to your lifestyle instead of limiting it.

settings.title: Engineered for Aussie Terrain
settings.content: From cracked pavements to gravel paths, Kaiju is engineered to handle Australia’s toughest terrain. A triple spring suspension system and 11” puncture-resistant tubeless tyres absorb bumps and deliver stability, keeping you comfortable and in control no matter where you ride.

settings.title: 2-Year Warranty & Aussie Support
settings.content: Ride with confidence. Every scooter is backed by a 2-year frame warranty, plus 1-year coverage for the battery, controller, charger, lights, and structural parts. You’ll also get real help from our Melbourne team. If something we made fails, we’ll repair or replace it, and we even cover return shipping.

settings.text: Why settle for less? Kaiju outperforms other scooters in power, range, and support — all at a better price.
Get More Power, More Range, and Local Aussie Support, for Less.

settings.title: Built for the Australian Terrain
settings.content: Built for the Australian terrain and tested in real-world conditions, the Kaiju delivers unmatched durability and reliability. Conquer your commute with confidence, no matter the challenge.

settings.title: The Best Value for Money E-Scooter Under $2,000

settings.content: Experience dual-motor performance with 3600W of combined power for fast, smooth rides.

settings.content: No more range anxiety with 100km max range and a portable battery you can charge anywhere

settings.title: Dual Spring Suspension
settings.content: Dual spring suspension ensures a cushioned, comfortable ride over any surface.

settings.title: 11" All-Terrain Tires
settings.content: Go wherever your adventure takes you with tires built for all surfaces.

settings.title: 24-Month Warranty
settings.content: Backed by Australia’s leading 24-month warranty, including frame coverage.

settings.title: Smart Battery Management System
settings.content: The Integrated Smart BMS with six layers of protection ensures safe, long-lasting battery performance.

settings.title: What is the warranty and how does it work?
settings.content: We offer a Limited Warranty for 24 months from the date of purchase, covering defects in materials and workmanship. The warranty process involves contacting Customer Support with a description of the defect, proof of purchase, serial number, and relevant photos/videos. If the defect is covered, they will repair or replace the part at no cost to you. Shipping costs for returning defective products are covered by us. The warranty does not cover damage caused by accidents, misuse, unauthorized repairs, normal wear and tear, or cosmetic damage. Key parts like the frame is covered for 2 years and battery is covered for 1 year.

settings.title: How can I service the scooter?
settings.content: You can service your e-scooter by bringing it to The Simple Commute's repair center (8/1001 Mountain Highway, Boronia, Melbourne), or you can ship it to us. Once the repair is complete, you have two weeks to pick up your scooter or pay the return shipping invoice. After this period, a storage fee of $25 per day applies, up to a maximum of 30 days. Proper packaging is crucial if you need to ship your scooter to the repair center. You can obtain third-party packaging or purchase a box from us (subject to availability). Repair turnaround times vary based on the availability of spare parts, ranging from 3-5 days to a minimum of 30 days. For updates, you can reach out to The Simple Commute team.

settings.title: What is the speed of the scooter?
settings.content: The speed of the Kaiju E-scooter is capable of reaching up to 50 km/h. However, we have to limit it to 25 km/h to comply with local regulations. If you'd like to unlock the full speed, you can contact us, but please be aware that you will be fully liable for any consequences that may arise from doing so.

settings.title: What is the range of the scooter?
settings.content: The standard model has a maximum range of up to 100 km on a full charge, making it ideal for longer commutes or extended rides.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.support_hours: Our customer support is available Monday to Friday: 8am-8:30pm.
